May 16, 2005

Trailers

I’ve written before about how much the voiceovers used for foreign-language movie trailers annoy me because they try to hide the fact that these films aren’t in English. Today Shashwati has a wonderful post about the man behind those trailers. {film, preview, trailer, Don Lafontaine}

May 14, 2005

616

It seems that Satanists have been dialing the wrong number all these years. It isn’t 666, but 616. I don’t know what area code 666 is, but 616 is in Michigan. {bible, history, numerology, satan}
